remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Mar-2013.)
statement:
cdleme42.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdleme42.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdleme42.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdleme42.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdleme42.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdleme42.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdleme42.v $e |- V = ( ( R .\/ S ) ./\ W ) $.
cdleme42a $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) /\ ( S e. A /\ -. S .<_ W ) ) -> ( R .\/ S ) = ( R .\/ V ) ) $.
